page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT West Forres
page.content: Although the land is mainly used for farming and forestry the use of modern machinery means that very few men are now employed in this way.Most people living in the area travel to Forres to work in schools,shops,offices etc. or are employed at RAF Kinloss.There are several small firms mainly family based e.g. Grovita Farm,a small market garden; Hizzet Trailers; Christie's Tree Nursery and a small sawmill at Balnageith.Two recently developed sources of employment are the Elizabethan Inn which has 24 part time staff and Mundole Court a function suite,shop and bar on the Mundole Caravan Park.A water bailliff looks after the River Findhorn and gamekeepers and a Forest Ranger are employed by the estate owners.
